solution_line_template: Ivan spent a total of ${initial_money} - ${money_left} = $<<{initial_money}-{money_left}={total_spent_on_cupcakes_and_milkshake}>>{total_spent_on_cupcakes_and_milkshake} on cupcakes and a milkshake.
The cost of the cupcake is ${initial_money} x {cupcake_fraction} = $<<{initial_money}*{cupcake_fraction}={cost_of_cupcake}>>{cost_of_cupcake}.
So, ${total_spent_on_cupcakes_and_milkshake} - ${cost_of_cupcake} = $<<{total_spent_on_cupcakes_and_milkshake}-{cost_of_cupcake}={cost_of_milkshake}>>{cost_of_milkshake} was spent on the milkshake.
